Good Honest Spirits Made By Hand & Elegantly Crafted From The Heart.

de Vine Wines & Spirits showcases locally sourced ingredients through an offering of craft whisky, gin, vodka, rum, vermouth, and wines made using traditional small batch techniques.

Our Spirits

infomation

our company

We are a true small-batch, craft distillery creating handcrafted spirits of the highest quality made solely from British Columbia-grown ingredients.

Get On The Bus To Whisky School:
Go behind the scenes of a working distillery. An after-hours experience like no other.
